00037 class CItemBase : public KListViewItem, public CPointers {
00038 public:
00039   enum Type {
00040     Unknown = 0,
00041     BookmarkFolder,
00042     Bookmark,
00043     OldBookmarkFolder, /* Bookmarks in the old 1.x <= 1.2 format*/
00044     BibleModuleFolder,
00045     CommentaryModuleFolder,
00046     LexiconModuleFolder,
00047     BookModuleFolder,
00048     DevotionalModuleFolder,
00049     GlossaryModuleFolder,
00050     ModuleLanguageFolder,
00051     Module
00052   };
00053   enum MenuAction {
00054     NewFolder = 0,
00055     ChangeFolder,
00056 
00057     ChangeBookmark,
00058     ImportBookmarks,
00059     ExportBookmarks,
00060     PrintBookmarks,
00061 
00062     DeleteEntries,
00063 
00064     SearchInModules,
00065     UnlockModule,
00066     AboutModule,
00067 
00068     ActionBegin = NewFolder,
00069     ActionEnd = AboutModule
00070   };
00071 
00072   CItemBase(CMainIndex* mainIndex, const Type type = Unknown);
00073   CItemBase(CItemBase* item, const Type type = Unknown);
00074 
00075   virtual ~CItemBase();
00076   virtual const QString toolTip();
00077   virtual CMainIndex* listView() const;
00082   virtual const bool isFolder() { return false; };
00083   const Type& type() const;
00084 
00085   virtual void init();
00086   virtual void update();
00087   void moveAfter( CItemBase* const item );
00091   virtual const bool enableAction( const MenuAction action );
00092   virtual const bool isMovable();
00093 
00097   virtual QDomElement saveToXML( QDomDocument& document ) { return QDomElement(); };
00101   virtual void loadFromXML( QDomElement& element ) {};
00102 
00103 protected:
00104   friend class CMainIndex;
00105   virtual void dropped( QDropEvent* e );
00106 
00107 private:
00108   Type m_type;
00109 };
